QuestData.Title: Aerial Advantage
QuestData.Description:
Gharmal's rocs dominate the skies above, striking at our forces as we advance. We cannot move the necropolis into position until they are cleared out!
I would slaughter them myself, but the cowards remain out of reach, and I am not constructed for flight.
You, however, seem slight enough of build. Take my riding hook and latch onto a roc.
Once you are atop of one, beat it to a pulp. Worry about the landing later.
QuestData.LogDescription: Grapple $2oa Battlesewn Rocs out of the sky.
QuestData.RewardText: I could hear their cries from here. Nice work!
